_header: Priest ne monk ne yet chanon

BLCottCleoBII.First Lines:
Prest ne monke ne ȝit chanonNe no man of
                    religion…
BLCottCleoBII.Last Lines:
…Lord god þat with paynes ill mankynde bought so dereLet
                    neuer man after me haue will to make him frere
